thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com
thread.title: Rosa

author: Rosa
title: Rosa
text:
Thanks for your valuable help, I am Hispanic and my English is not perfect but I dared to make a temple for months and with the guidance of the help team I did, last month I saw the Monstroid pages and they really captivated me but I saw that it was More challenging to do it, but I read that they helped guide me and they are doing it. Thank you Daysi, Rubi, Martika, Alison, and the names I do not remember.
I was really guided and taught by sending me videos to learn I'm halfway through finishing my page and I think I'm doing well!
